title: Twitter Exploded As Soon As Mahendra Singh Dhoni Announced Retirement From Test Cricket
text:
facebook 
Mahendra Singh Dhoni has officially retired from Test cricket. Yesterday, as soon as the third Test Match between India and Australia ended in a draw, Dhoni announced his retirement with utmost ease. He is one of the finest captains India has had, and has always maintained his cool even under great pressure. On many occasions he has gotten the team out of the stickiest of situations, and how can we forget his signature "helicopter shot". He is a marvellous batsman, a spectacular fielder, and a level-headed captain. 
So, when this news was announced, people (even celebrities) were bound to go crazy on Twitter and here is what they said. 1. Sushant Singh Rajput took a bow to Dhoni, and expressed his sadness.
